text.div:
MedicationRecord

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7belgium.org/fhir/riziv-medicationrecord/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.riziv-medicationrecord

Medication Record

grouping.name: Medication Record - schema
grouping.description: Conformance artifacts for Medication Record, to meet the scope of the Medication Schema

grouping.name: Medication Record - future conformance
grouping.description: Medication Record - artifacts that are related to the more advanced features and scope of the Medication Record, beyond the Medication Schema

grouping.name: Medication Record - Validating examples
grouping.description: Medication Record / Medication Schema examples and scenarios for validation

grouping.name: Supporting Resources
grouping.description: Supporting resources used in the examples

resource.name: ExampleScenario 1 - Changing brand name in the same VOS
resource.description: Prescribed branded medication is changed by another branded medication from the same VOS-cluster

resource.name: ExampleScenario 2 - Changing by another medication from a different VOS
resource.description: Prescribed medication is changed by another medication from a different VOS-cluster

resource.name: ExampleScenario 3 - Dispense medication before the prescription is available
resource.description: Dispense of a medication that is made before an existing prescription

resource.name: ExampleScenario 4 - Dispense of prescribed medication and of a product without a prescription
resource.description: Dispense of two products. One that has a prescription and other that does not (and does not need one).

resource.name: ExampleScenario 5 - Dispense of new brand medication because the old is unavailable
resource.description: Prescription that is made by brand name and the pharmacist changes the brand name for another brand name in the same VOS - Cluster because there is no stock.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 6 - Refusal to dispense the prescribed medication
resource.description: Prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist refuses to dispense the medication due to interaction with previous medication.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 7 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed to take if needed, but was not taken
resource.description: Prescription that is made by VOS and to take only if needed and the pharmacist dispenses it. Then it is reported that the medication was not taken at all.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 8 - Dispense of medication that was prescribed, but not taken till the end
resource.description: Prescription that is made by VOS and the pharmacist dispenses it. But at the time of administration, the treatment is stopped due to a reaction.

resource.name: ExampleScenario 13 - Dispense of OTC medication for acute symptons
resource.description: Dispense of medication OTC and how treatment resources should be handled

resource.name: Patient scheduled medication for week x
Medication View profile -second visualization
resource.description: The profile for how to organize the information in a medication View 2
